SA07n946:2: atha dvijo bāla ivāptavedaḥ kṣipraṃ vaṇik prāpta ivāptalābhaḥ |
SA07n946:3: jitvā ca rājanya ivārisainyaṃ nandaḥ kṛtārtho gurumabhyagacchat ||1 ||
SA07n946:4: draṣṭuṃ sukhaṃ jñānasamāptikāle gururhi śiṣyasya gurośca śiṣyaḥ |
SA07n946:5: pariśramaste saphalo mayīti yato didṛkṣāsya munau babhūva ||2 ||
SA07n946:7: āryaḥ sarāgo'pi kṛtajñabhāvāt prakṣīṇamānaḥ kimu vītarāgaḥ ||3 ||
SA07n946:8: yasyārthakāmaprabhavā hi bhaktistato'sya sā tiṣṭhati rūḍhamūlā |
SA07n946:9: dharmānvayo yasya tu bhaktirāgastasya prasādo hṛdayāvagāḍhaḥ ||4 ||
SA07n946:10: kāṣāyavāsāḥ kanakāvadātastataḥ sa mūrdhnā gurave praṇeme |
SA07n946:12: athātmanaḥ śiṣyaguṇasya caiva mahāmuneḥ śāstṛguṇasya caiva |
SA07n946:13: saṃdarśanārthaṃ sa na mānahetoḥ svāṃ kāryasiddhiṃ kathayāmbabhūva ||6 ||
SA07n946:14: yo dṛṣṭiśalyo hṛdayāvagāḍhaḥ prabho bhṛśaṃ māmatudat sutīkṣṇaḥ |
SA07n946:15: tvadvākyasaṃdaṃśamukhena me sa samuddhṛtaḥ śalyahṛteva śalyaḥ ||7 ||
SA07n946:16: kathaṃkathābhāvagatosmi yena chinnaḥ sa niḥsaṃśaya saṃśayo me |
SA07n946:19: tanme hataṃ tvadvacanāgadena viṣaṃ vināśīva mahāgadena ||9 ||
SA07n946:20: kṣayaṃ gataṃ janma nirastajanman saddharmacaryāmuṣito'smi samyak |
SA07n946:21: kṛtsnaṃ kṛtaṃ me kṛtakārya kāryaṃ lokeṣu bhūto'smi na lokadharmā ||10 ||
SA07n946:23: tavāsmi gāṃ sādhu nipīya tṛptastṛṣeva gāmuttama vatsavarṇaḥ ||11 ||
SA07n946:24: yatpaśyataścādhigamo mamāyaṃ tanme samāsena mune nibodha |
SA07n946:25: sarvajña kāmaṃ viditaṃ tavaitat svaṃ tūpacāraṃ pravivakṣurasmi ||12 ||
SA07n946:26: anye'pi santo vimumukṣavo hi śrutvā vimokṣāya nayaṃ parasya |
SA07n946:27: muktasya rogādiva rogavantastenaiva mārgeṇa sukhaṃ ghaṭante ||13 ||
SA07n946:28: urvyādikān janmani vedima dhātun nātmānamurvyādiṣu teṣu kiñcit |
SA07n946:29: yasmādatasteṣu na me'sti saktirbahiśca kāyena samā matirme ||14 ||
SA07n946:33: tasmādanityeṣu nirātmakeṣu duḥkheṣu me teṣvapi nāsti saṃgaḥ ||16 ||
SA07n946:34: yataśca lokaṃ samajanmaniṣṭhaṃ paśyāmi niḥsāramasacca sarvam |
SA07n946:35: ato dhiyā me manasā vibaddhamasmīti me neñjitamasti yena ||17 ||
SA07n946:37: amūrcchitaścāgrathitaśca tatra tribhyo vimukto'smi tato bhavebhyaḥ ||18 ||
SA07n946:39: yasmāt samātmānugataśca tatra tasmād visaṃyogagato'smi muktaḥ ||19 ||
SA07n946:40: ityevamuktvā gurubāhumānyāt sarveṇa kāyena sa gāṃ nipannaḥ |
SA07n946:42: tataḥ pramādat prasṛtasya pūrvaṃ śruvā dhṛtiṃ vyākaraṇaṃ ca tasya |
SA07n946:44: uttiṣṭha dharme sthita śiṣyajuṣṭe kiṃ pādayorme patito'si murdhnā |
SA07n946:45: abhyarcanaṃ me na tathā praṇāmo dharme yathaiṣā pratipattireva ||22 ||
SA07n946:47: jitātmanaḥ pravrajanaṃ hi sādhu calātmano na tvajitendriyasya ||23 ||
SA07n946:48: adyāsi śaucena pareṇa yukto vākkāyacetāṃsi śucīni yatte |
SA07n946:49: ataḥ punaścāprayatāpasaumyāṃ yatsaumya no vekṣyasi garbhaśayyām ||24 ||
SA07n946:51: kṛtaśruto vipratipadyamāno nindyo hi nirvīrya ivāttaśastraḥ ||25 ||
SA07n946:53: yāsyāmi niṣṭhāmiti bāliśo hi janmakṣayāt trāsamihābhyupaiti ||26 ||
SA07n946:54: diṣṭyā durāpaḥ kṣaṇasaṃnipāto nāyaṃ kṛto mohavaśena moghaḥ |
SA07n946:55: udeti duḥkhena gato hyadhastāt kūrmo yugacchidra ivārṇavasthaḥ ||27 ||
SA07n946:56: nirjitya māraṃ yudhi durnivāramadyāsi loke raṇaśīrṣaśūraḥ |
SA07n946:57: śūro'pyaśūraḥ sa hi veditavyo doṣairamitrairiva hanyate yaḥ ||28 ||
SA07n946:58: nirvāpya rāgāgnimudīrṇamadya diṣṭyā sukhaṃ svapsyasi vītadāhaḥ |
SA07n946:59: duḥkhaṃ hi śete śayane'pyudāre kleśāgninā cetasi dahyamānaḥ ||29 ||
SA07n946:61: yāvat satarṣaḥ puruṣo hi loke tāvat samṛddho'pi sadā daridraḥ ||30 ||
SA07n946:62: adyāpadeṣṭuṃ tava yuktarūpaṃ śuddhodano me nṛpatiḥ piteti |
SA07n946:65: sarvo hi saṃsāragato bhayārto yathaiva kāntāragatastathaiva ||32 ||
SA07n946:66: āraṇyakaṃ bhaikṣacaraṃ vinītaṃ drakṣyāmi nandaṃ nibhṛtaṃ kadeti |
SA07n946:67: āsīt purastāttvayi me didṛkṣā tathāsi diṣṭyā mama darśanīyaḥ ||33 ||
SA07n946:68: bhavatyarūpo'pi hi darśanīyaḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ śreṣṭhatamaigurṇaiḥ svaiḥ |
SA07n946:69: doṣaiḥ parīto malinīkaraistu sudarśanīyo'pi virūpa eva ||34 ||
SA07n946:70: adya prakṛṣṭā tava buddhimattā kṛtsnaṃ yayā te kṛtamātmakāryam |
SA07n946:71: śrutonnatasyāpi hi nāsti buddhirnotpadyate śreyasi yasya buddhiḥ ||35 ||
SA07n946:72: unmīlitasyāpi janasya madhye nimīlitasyāpi tathaiva cakṣuḥ |
SA07n946:73: prajñāmayaṃ yasya hi nāsti cakṣuścakṣurna tasyāsti sacakṣuṣo'pi ||36 ||
SA07n946:75: ajasramāgacchati tacca bhūyo jñānena yasyādya kṛtastvayāntaḥ ||37 ||
SA07n946:76: duḥkhaṃ na me syāt sukhameva me syāditi pravṛttaḥ satataṃ hi lokaḥ |
SA07n946:77: na vetti taccaiva tathā yathā syāt prāptaṃ tvayādyāsulabhaṃ yathāvat ||38 ||
SA07n946:79: staveṣu nindāsu ca nirvyapekṣaḥ kṛtāñjalirvākyamuvāca nandaḥ ||39 ||
SA07n946:80: aho viśeṣeṇa viśeṣadarśin stvayānukampā mayi darśiteyaṃ |
SA07n946:82: bhrātrā tvayā śreyasi daiśikena pitrā phalasthena tathaiva mātrā |
SA07n946:83: hato'bhaviṣyaṃ yadi na vyamokṣyaṃ sārthāt paribhraṣṭa ivākṛtārthaḥ ||41 ||
SA07n946:84: śāntasya tuṣṭasya sukho viveko vijñātatattvasva parīkṣakasya |
SA07n946:86: atho hi tattvaṃ parigamya samyaṅnirdhūya doṣānadhigamya śāntim |
SA07n946:87: svaṃ nāśramaṃ samprati cintayāmi na taṃ janaṃ nāpsaraso na devān ||43 ||
SA07n946:88: idaṃ hi bhuktvā śuci śāmikaṃ sukhaṃ na me manaḥ kāṃkṣati kāmajaṃ sukham |
SA07n946:90: aho'ndhavijñānanimīlitaṃ jagat paṭāntare paśyati nottamaṃ sukham |
SA07n946:91: sudhīramadhyatmasukhaṃ vyapāsya hi śramaṃ tathā kāmasukhārthamṛcchati ||45 ||
SA07n946:92: yathā hi ratnākarametya durmatirvihāya ratnānyasato maṇīn haret |
SA07n946:93: apāsya saṃbodhisukhaṃ tathottamaṃ śramaṃ vrajet kāmasukhopalabdhaye ||46 ||
SA07n946:95: apāsya yaddhyānasukhaṃ mune paraṃ parasya duḥkhoparamāya khidyase ||47 ||
SA07n946:96: mayā nu śakyaṃ pratikartumadya kiṃ gurau hitaiṣiṇyanukampake tvayi |
SA07n946:98: tato ministasya niśamya hetumat prahīṇasarvāsravasūcakaṃ vacaḥ |
SA07n946:99: idaṃ babhāṣe vadatāmanuttamo yadarhati śrīghana eva bhāṣituṃ ||49 ||
SA07n946:100: idaṃ kṛtārthaḥ paramārthavit kṛtī tvameva dhīmannabhidhātumarhasi |
SA07n946:103: na dṛṣṭasatyo'pi tathāvabudhyate pṛthagjanaḥ kiṃbata buddhimānapi ||51 ||
SA07n946:105: rajaḥprakarṣeṇa jagatyavasthite kṛtajñabhāvo hi kṛtajña durlabhaḥ ||52 ||
SA07n946:106: sadharma dharmānvayato yataśca te mayi prasādo'dhigame ca kauśalam |
SA07n946:107: ato'sti bhūyastvayi me vivakṣitaṃ nato hi bhaktaśca niyogamarhasi ||53 ||
SA07n946:108: avāptakāryo'si parāṃ gatiṃ gato na te'sti kiñcit karaṇīyamaṇvapi |
SA07n946:109: ataḥparaṃ saumya carānukampayā vimokṣayan kṛcchragatān parānapi ||54 ||
SA07n946:112: ihottamebhyo'pi mataḥ sa tūttamo ya uttamaṃ dharmamavāpya naiṣṭhikam |
SA07n946:114: vihāya tasmādiha kāryamātmanaḥ kuru sthirātman parakāryamapyatho |
SA07n946:115: bhramatsu sattveṣu tamāvṛtātmasu śrutapradīpo niśi dhāryatāmayam ||57 ||
SA07n946:116: bravītu tāvat puri vismito janastvayi sthite kurvati dharmadeśanāḥ
SA07n946:117: aho batāścaryamidaṃ vimuktaye karoti rāgī yadayaṃ kathāmiti ||58 ||
SA07n946:118: dhruvaṃ hi saṃśrutya tava sthiraṃ mano nivṛttanānāviṣayairmanorathaiḥ |
SA07n946:119: vadhūrgṛhe sāpi tavānukurvatī kariṣyate strīṣu virāgiṇīḥ kathāḥ ||59 ||
SA07n946:120: tvayi paramadhṛtau niviṣṭatattve bhavanagatā na hi raṃsyate dhruvaṃ sā |
SA07n946:121: manasi śamadamātmake vivikte matiriva kāmasukhaiḥ parīkṣakasya ||60 ||
SA07n946:122: ityarhataḥ paramakāruṇikasya śāsturmūrdhnā vacaśca caraṇau ca samaṃ gṛhītvā |
SA07n946:123: svasthaḥ praśāntahṛdayo vinivṛttakāryaḥ pārśvānmuneḥ pratiyayau vimadaḥ karīva ||61 ||
SA07n946:124: bhikṣārthaṃ samaye viveśa sa puraṃ dṛṣṭīrjanasyākṣipan
SA07n946:126: nirmokṣāya cakāra tatra ca kathāṃ kāle janāyārthine
SA07n946:128: ityeṣā vyupaśāntaye na rataye mokṣārthagarbhā kṛtiḥ
SA07n946:130: yanmokṣāt kṛtamanyadatra hi mayā tatkāvyadharmāt kṛtaṃ
SA07n946:131: pātuṃ titkamivauṣadhaṃ madhuyutaṃ hṛdyaṃ kathaṃ syāditi ||63 ||
SA07n946:133: kāvyavyājena tattvaṃ kathitamiha mayā mokṣaḥ paramiti |
SA07n946:134: tadbuddhvā śamikaṃ yattadavahitamito grāhyaṃ na lalitaṃ
SA07n946:136: saundarananda mahākāvya meṃ “ājñā-vyākaraṇa“ nāmaka aṣṭādaśa sarga samāpta |
